comments:

the "Show Monitors" option on, the VM disappears from the debug view, and this 
exception appears in the log:

We need to warn users that monitor information is not available for a VM when 
they have the option to show monitors on. Could we put up a dialog when such a 
VM is launched/added to the debug view (not sure on the exact time we should 
show this), informing the user that they have chosen the option to show 
monitors, but the information is not available. The dialog should have 
a "don't tell me again" style check box.

The ThreadMonitorManager should just ignore VMs that do not support the 
feature.

Fixed.
I added tests, so no information is returned if the VM doesn't support monitor
information.

ThreadMonitorManager - added the tests
